Sergio Marchionne noted in a statement that Chrysler's recovery has so far bested industry expectations, but he added that the automaker was still a long way from meeting its objectives. Our job is not yet done, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` We have a lot of work ahead to fulfill our five-year business plan objectives.'' Eric Schmidt is stepping down as CEO of Google, and Larry Page is taking over the company just announced in its earnings release. Eric Schmidt will become Executive Chairman focused on, deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership, the company says. Google's other cofounder, Sergey Brin will take a more active role in strategic projects including product. The change is effective starting April 4, 2011.

in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
